name: Cyber Demon Bunny
description:
Cyber Demon Bunny is an addictive hardcore platformer where you control a cyber demonic bunny trying to escape hell.

Activate the Pillars to open the portal and escape with your demonic life intact!

Controls (Gamepad/Keyboard)

  1. Move - LeftStick / Arrow Keys
  2. Jump in place - Y / Space Key
  3. Long Jump - A / L.Shift
  4. Bomb - B / L.Control
  5. Reset Level* - X / R Key

* In case of getting stuck by bugs or similar issues.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Cyber Demon Bunny was developed during Global Game Jam 2017.

This is Just a PROTOTYPE - We will be updating and improving on it on the following weeks. Please gives a shout. Thanks for trying it out!

Programmers: Matias Irusta & Andrés Micalizzi

Art & UI: Mauricio Diaz

Music & SFX: Diego Mortenssen

San Luis - Argentina - 2017
